name: Space Cave HD
description:
Space Cave HD is a higher res version of last years LOWREZJAM 2017 entry

Space Cave HD on Lexallofle BBS

Controlls:

  • X to SHOOT BULLETS
  • Z to SHOOT ROCKETS/FIREBALLS
  • UP to FLY UP

In this game you fly through a cave filled with dudes that for some unknown reason want to kill you.

Have fun ;)
